Mini 1596 (Minimence I: The Murder)
Modded by Salamence20
Reviewed by N, Mykonian, and AngryPidgeon

Status: Game Over!


Spoiler: Opening Flavor
6 years ago, a girl chosen by the light and her allies defeated the being of darkness, known as Josephine.

In order to slay Josephine, the girl sacrificed herself to ensure that Josephine never returns to spread her darkness across the land. Her name was Alexandra Appleby. Her sacrifice defeated the darkness and the land was engulfed in light, resolving all its conflict.

As for the 5 allies who accompanied her, they now live normal, happy lives, blessed by the light and relieved of their previous pains. These heroes were unlikely, their lives tarnished by the harshness of the world:

A girl who lost her parents to the pressures of darkness, thus losing her way herself.

A girl who owns many riches, but never truly earned it.

A girl of mystery, never understood her past, and isn’t willing to talk about it.

An intelligent boy with an ego, but that was just to hide the fact he is lonely and depressed.

And me, a nobody who missed Alexandra more than anything in the world.

Now, 6 years later after the defeat, I, Sal, dedicated myself as the new guardian of the land, but it wasn’t necessary: There was no darkness, crime was nonexistent.

Until today…

To the north of the capital, Appleby Heights, is the high school. Inside, a teacher was slain, the first murder in the land since the defeat. The teacher’s name was Mr. N (Literally, no one questioned it, and no one had reason to). Principal Mykonian came to me and told me he had no idea why this happened, but he brought forth 13 of N’s students. Any of these students could be the culprit or culprits, and it was necessary to deal with them now.
If the darkness is back, I need to get rid of it.

Rules (Stolen from the legendary Skullduggery):

General Etiquette:
(1) Play to win. Be competitive. Don't be lame. Don't flake out on us.
(2) Do not take screenshots or directly quote any of the PMs that I send you. Doing so will result in a mod-kill. Pretending to break this rule is the same as actually breaking it. You may paraphrase, but use caution. When in doubt, run it by me first.
(3) Do not edit any of your posts, if you have the ability to do so.
(4) Do not use encrypted text, hidden text, small text, or any other hard-to-read text when posting.
(5) Once you have been lynched or killed, you are out of the game. Do not post anymore until the game is over. That means no "Bah!" posts, please.
(6) Do not talk about this game with anybody else outside of this thread unless your role PM explicitly says that you can.
(7) Heated discussion is fine, but personal attacks, insults, flaming, and poor sportsmanship are not. Please don't be a jerk to your fellow players. If I feel that your behavior is preventing other players from enjoying the game, I reserve the right to force-replace or mod-kill you.
(8) Do not talk about ongoing games. Seriously, don't.

Day, Night, and Twilight:
(9) Each Day phase will last for two weeks apiece and each Night phase will last for two days apiece. I will post specific deadlines in the game thread at the start of every Day and Night phase.
(10) Players may continue to talk during Twilight, including the player that has been lynched.
(11) If you do not send me your Night action before the specified deadline, I will assume that you are not performing an action on that Night.
(12) If you know you will be unavailable during a Night phase, you may send me your night action during the preceding Day phase if you so desire.
(13) Deadline extension requests will be considered on a case-by-case basis.

Voting:
(14) Please post all votes and unvotes using either the bold tag or the vote tag. Votes should look like this: Vote: Salamence or VOTE: Sala
(15) Unvotes are helpful, but not necessary.
(16) Please refrain from engaging in any kind of voting trickery. If it looks like a vote, I'm counting it as a vote.
(17) A lynch will only occur when a majority (more than 50% of all possible votes) is reached. The number of votes needed to hammer will be included with every vote count.
(18) If a majority is not reached by the deadline, there will be no lynch on that Day.
(19) Once a hammer occurs, no votes or unvotes will prevent the lynch from happening.
(20) Additional votes include VOTE: No Lynch to end the Day with no lynch (which will also require a majority) and VOTE: Draw to end the game in a draw (which will require 100% agreement from all living players).

Activity:
(21) You will be expected to post at least once every 48 hours. If you go more than 48 hours without posting, you will be prodded.
(22) If you receive a prod, you will have 24 hours to post in the game thread. If you do not respond to your prod within 24 hours, you will be replaced. Additionally, if I have to prod you more than three times, you will be replaced.
(23) If you know that you will have limited access to the game for more than a few days, please let me know either in the thread or via PM.

Communication with the Moderator:
(24) I may be cooler and sexier than you, but I do still make mistakes every now and then. If you notice an error with the vote counts, deadlines, or anything else related to the game, please let me know and I will correct the issue.
(25) I will not answer any role-related questions in the game thread. If you have any questions about your role, the (theoretical) roles of any other players in the game, or (theoretical) role interactions, send me a PM. Do not try to trick me into confirming a player's role. I will not be amused.
(26) If you need to get my attention, just include @Mod or @Salamence in your post.

Miscellaneous:
(27) If you have any problems with another player, send me a PM and I will do my best to resolve the issue.
(28) If a player is mod-killed during the Day phase, then that Day will end immediately.
(29) My color is blue (#0040FF) DON’T USE IT
(30) The flavor text is for entertainment purposes only. Analyze it at your own risk.
(31) Do not ask me to mod-kill, force-replace, or discipline any other player in the game. That is my decision to make, not yours.
(32) As the moderator, my word is final. Please respect my instructions and my decisions.
(33) I reserve the right to change these rules during the game if necessary. If this happens, I will inform everybody of the rule change in the thread.
(34) In addition to these rules, all site-wide rules also apply.
(35) Claiming color code is prohibited.

Here is the VT PM,
VT PM wrote:Greetings, Salamence20, you are a Vanilla Townie. You can talk during the day and sleep during the night. You also have a vote that allows you to lynch anyone you want, or to not use it at all. You win when all threats to the town have been defeated. Please PM me your role to confirm

Role PMs Sent!

Game starts after 11/13 have confirmed.

"Ok Salamence," Mykonian said, "these were the last 13 students to have contact with Mr. N"

I took a look at them, and they looked at me. Some looked impressed to see me, others looked ashamed, some didn't give a shit. But there was one thing I knew for sure:

atleast someone here killed Mr. N, but why?

11 of 13 players have confirmed! Day one officially begins now!

With 13 players, it takes 7 to lynch

Day One ends Sunday, August 10, at 7:00 EST (Countdown will go here in a minute)

Marcus2596 & Acryon have 48 hours to respond to their PM.

It's been a long day. I've been looking through the files of the 13 students that mykonian gave me. Meanwhile the students seemed to be just fine. Boonskiies and his brother, Espresso arm wrestled. RedCoyote worked on his studies. Slandaar and Riabi went to smoke a cigarette. Bicephalous Bob flexed his muscles, Candice talked to whoever listened to him about his vacation, acryon took a nap. The rest... on their cellphones. Ah, the wonders of technology.

I spent forever looking at the files, but I couldn't decide. I'm not a good person at deciding things. I got dizzy, to the point of fainting, but then *WACK!* Two students begin fighting over a box of colored pencils. Mykonian and I break up the fight. Fortunately, there weren't any bruises or anything serious (just a lot of scratch marks, it almost looked like a fox and a cat got into it). But that fight showed me that one of these guys were probably influenced by Josephine.

I picked Reinoe...

Reinoe went through a lot of turmoil in his 18 years of living. When he was two, his mother fell ill and died. Later on in life, he vowed to become a doctor, no matter what! When Alexandra slayed Josephine, Reinoe was 12. When the light shined through the world, Reinoe got to see his mother. Her mother was proud of him, no matter what. It was a tearful moment. But just because there was light, didn't mean darkness was nonexistent. As much as he wanted to be a nurse, he just wasn't smart enough. He was also shy and sheltered, and was the constant target for bullies. He applied for a nurse job, but failed to get it. Multiple time, infact! All ended in failures. Reinoe was still going to keep trying. When Mr. N died. The thought that someone committed murder, scared him. While Sala looked at the files he took some colored pencils and began to doodle. While he was doodling, someone snagged his colored pencils. It was DarkLightA. He then punched Reinoe in the face. They began to fight until Sala and Mykonian broke up the fight...

"It's not me" Reinoe says, "I just want to become a nurse"

I looked at him, and he looked at me. He knew that he was going to see his mother very soon. He began to cry and ran off to the bathroom.

I sighed and put my head down for a little while. I then proceeded to the bathroom to see something I haven't seen in forever.

Reinoe was dead. Suicide. I had made the wrong decision, and now an innocent had died. I was doing Josephines work for her...

Mistakes hurt. It's never good to be wrong... especially when you are supposed to be the hero. Goodbye Reinoe, I hope you and your mother are reunited.

-----------------------------------------------------------

Meanwhile, miles and miles away from Appleby Heights was a dark castle thought to be abandoned for many years. On a balcony was an intimidating black haired girl and her cute little puppy having a drink and looking at the skyline. She could she Appleby Heights, shining in the distance.

She hated it.

Then her phone rang. "Hello? How is it going? Excellent, all according to plan. Thank you, you are doing a good thing for your land." *hangs up*

Her sister, Tierney walked up to the girl and said, "How did the day go?"

"Excellent", the girl said, "an innocent died and Sala's confidence is diminishing".

"So the operation is in effect then?"

"Yes"

"What about the prisoner?"

"Keep him alive for now. We deal with Sala first, then we deal with Kondi."

------------------------------------

Another long day. Another long day of figuring out who could be working for Josephine. I decided to go get something to eat in the cafeteria to get some focus. I haven't eaten in days...

Meanwhile. Boonskiies, Elyse, Hiplop, Acryon, and Candice played go fish. Bob was down in the weight room, benching 400 lbs, followed by leg pressing 900 lbs. Red didn't care about anyone and anything, and kept to his studies, Trig is hard, you know?

Outside Slandaar was having yet another cigarette. He didn't show it, but he deeply missed his buddy Riabi...

While in the cafeteria, I was grabbing some food, while I was visited by the school's janitor AngryPidgeon. He didn't say much. Only one word: Boonskiies.

While walking back, I peeked through a science room, it was empty from the window. But a closer look showed that someone had been lynched alive: Boonskiies. I went upstairs and said what the hell!?

The students present replied, he cheated. At go *fucking* fish.

Night 2 begins now. Deadline is in (expired on 2014-08-28 18:49:00)

Did you ever imagine what the future would be like? You know? With flying cars, teleporters and all that futuristic mumbo jumbo. Well it exists, it's the city of Kondi.

Before the light, and even before the rise of Josephine, Kondi used to be just an ordinary city to the east of Appleby Heights (which, at the time was under a different name). It was your ordinary monarch, ran by the Kondi family, who maintained order and peace through its city. Unfortunately, some methods the Kondi's used were shady.

Josephine set her sights on Kondi multiple times, citing that she wanted the monarch for herself. Fearing that their army could not protect the city, The Queen and King came to Alexandria and us to secretly protect the city without suspicion. The Kondi's had a reputation for order, and if word got out that the monarch couldn't handle itself, then someone else would take the city over.

When Alexandria defeated Josephine, light spread to the city. Miners found a rare element inside a mountain near Kondi, which turned out to be something that could advance Kondi into the future, creating a city that stands above the others. Also the. Kondi's were not happy with Appleby Heights becoming the "capital" of the land. They were jealous. Some say they are still now.

Sometime near the fall of Josephine, Prince Kondi was to be married to a girl. The day of the wedding, however, Prince Kondi disappeared, never to be heard from again. Some say he died, some say he abandoned his city for Appleby Heights. No one knows.

Now, as we speak, the princess left at the altar is now the Queen. Single heir to the Kondi throne...

---------------------------------------------------------

I will be working tomorrow around deadline so the thread will not be opened until early friday, however all actions must be sent to me by the deadline.

So far, 3 people have died. I killed Reinoe, Josephine killed Riabi, and the class killed Boonskiies. That is three too many. We needed to put a stop to this. I needed to put a stop to this. I went back to look at everyone's files again, word for word... Until I found something interesting about Candice....

Meanwhile, the diminishing class was getting smaller, everyone was becoming paranoid, except Bob, Red, and Espresso. Bob had confidence he could fight this enemy, Red was still busy with schoolwork, and Espresso... Espresso witnessed his brother die. He wanted to die too. Candice tried to keep the group entertained and happy, but that was to no success. He went to go to the restroom...

"Mykonian. Candice isn't from here." I said. "He's from-"
"Shhhhhhhh. We don't need word getting out of that"
"But it doesn't make sense. If he is from... There, why is he speaking like a normal person? Why is he seeking education? Those people don't like that."

Candice was in the restroom washing his hands. After, he turned around and saw someone unexpected.

"Candice is special. Not like those people. He isn't a moron. He learned our language and wishes to improve his knowledge. But it's not the unusual background that makes him special... Candice can see the light and the dark in people. He just doesn't know it..."

Hiplop is gone. GAME OVER MAN. GAME OVER.

"Wake up"
"Wake up"
"WAKE UP!!!"

I was slapped. I figured I was up, but who I saw in front of me definitely made this a dream.

"Hi Sally" said the voice of an old friend, Ashley, a girl who was a lot of trouble. Thing is, she should be dead... But her warm smile felt lively.

"It seems you are in a pickle. Haven't found the killer or killers yet? I'm disappointed. What would Alexandra think?"

I put my head down, innocent people died, I should have stopped it (even if some weren't of my control). Alexandra would have stopped them.

Ashley, like always, was optimistic. "You can't be perfect, not even Alexandra was perfect, just trust in the light."

"I don't know..."

"And if you can't" Ashley replied, "You have her light to follow." She then pointed to my chest, where the microphone with Alexandra's initials was at. It felt warm.

"You will get them, Salamence"

----------------------------------------------------

I woke up for real this time. Same place I was at, but no Ashley. I pulled out the microphone. I thought of Alexandra. She loved to talk, she even said if things got back to normal and Josephine fell that she would love to be a journalist or a broadcaster. She just loved current events and the news, and why not? Half of the news back then was about us.

Then a great light appeared. I was blinded, all I saw was white, but while I was blinded, I could have sworn I saw something. What was that?

The microphone was gone. In my hand was something else. A weapon that came in handy when I needed it most, when we were backed against the wall, a sign that we couldn't give up when the going gets tough.

The Magimence Wand...

Mykonian came in, informing me of the death of Csareo. I told him that I was ready. The tide was turning, Josephine was going down.

----------------------------------------------------------

Meanwhile, Slandaar was paranoid. He was also smoking his last cigarette. So yeah, he was pissed. He wanted vengeance, he wanted those responsible to pay. He was tired of waiting for Salamence to make the move. It was time.

The other 6 students remaining were upstairs in the classroom, doing what they normally do. Slandaar came in and locked the door.

"What the hell!?" Said Elyse.

"Shut the fuck up" Slandaar said, pulling a gun out. "WHOEVER KILLED MY BEST FRIEND RIABI DIES TODAY!"

Hiplop screamed like a girl, Acryon and DarkLightA freaked out, Bob yelled "COME AT ME BRO" until Elyse dragged him out.

There was just RedCoyote. Who was on his computer and didn't give a damn. "Red," Slandaar said, "Get up and go over to the side".

"I don't feel like it. I'm busy." Slandaar then pulled the gun up to his face. Red then slammed his computer, looked at slandaar and said, "shoot hiplop."

"FUCKING. MOVE." Red moved.

Everyone was on one side of the classroom, and Slandaar was on the other side.

Mykonian, AngryPidgeon, and I slammed the door open with a burst of air. I pointed the wand at Slandaar. He then dropped the gun, "I- I just wanted revenge"

I looked at Slandaar and could see what he was feeling. I felt the magimence wand and I knew who was going down.

"THUNDER!" I pointed at Hiplop. Instead of being shocked to death, it was blocked... by dark magic.

Hiplop laughed like a woman, a dark aura covered him. He channeled all of it to summon the ultimate dark move, only used by Josephine herself.

DARKAGA!!! He screamed, but he wasn't powerful enough to use the move, he vanished.

One of the bad guys is gone, I smiled, Mykonian was happy, and AngryPidgeon, AngryPidgeon, wasn't happy. This wasn't part of the plan, was it time to panic? Was the light resurging? Uh oh. He got on his phone and called Tierney.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hiplop has been lynched! He was a Mafia Roleblocker!!!

Night 4 has begun! The war isn't over yet!
You have 48 hours to submit actions!

Tierney was pissed. A little scared at what her sister would say about the death, but other than that, she was pissed. She ran to her sister, who was reading a book. "Sis," Tierney said, "Hiplop is-"

Her sister put up her hand, signaling to leave, without any negative expression. Tierney sighed, and left.

She slammed her book shut and meditated. A dark aura covered her skinny figure. It felt warm, it made her feel empowered, it gave her strength.

"You better know what you are doing."

"You dare doubt me, I am all-powerful, his wand is the key. Continue with the plan."

"But-"

"CONTINUE!!!" She staggered, losing the dark aura around her. She brushed herself up, and decided to call another one of her captains.

"Captain Brandon B. Molla."

"Yo" He said.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Down in the basement dungeon, the prisoner was doing pull-ups to keep in shape, until he heard Tierney coming downstairs.

"Hello, my sweet prince" Tierney batted her eyes. He spat at her. Tierney laughed, and suddenly, out of nowhere, the prince fell asleep.

"Time to move" Tierney said.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

See you all in 24 hours (or so!)

Sorry, when Dallas wins a game like that, you party all night! (It don't happen much )

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Right after the death of Hiplop, AngryPidgeon went outside to call Tierney. "He got one, Hiplop of all people too."

"My sis isn't going to like this."

"The plan still continues, we still should have Sala in our grasp by the end of today. Oh I got one more question."

"What's that?"

"Do you think Sala knows about time magic?"

"What!? Don't do it, you will end up killing yourself! Don't use magic outside your control, Pidgeon."

"We don't have time for that, Tierney" He hung up.

Within seconds, AngryPidgeon closed his eyes, "Just a few seconds is all I need," he whispered. The entire world froze, nothing moved. Time was stopped. He went upstairs to the classroom where the others were celebrating Hiplop's defeat. He pulled out his Shadow Piercer and stabbed Acryon. Alot, without time even noticing. He ran back downstairs, but before he could get back, he obtained a major headache which caused him to scream and time moved again. AngryPidgeon was knocked out...

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

We were celebrating Hiplop's loss, but that was short lived. Within seconds, Acryon fell, stab wounds everywhere. How was this possible, and who? It looks like we have some more work to do. However, the Magimence Wand shone bright. This is on me, and I don't plan on failing.

AngryPidgeon woke up. He had no idea where he was. He wasn't at the school anymore. He was in a jail cell. His only assumption was that he must have fell into a coma.

Tierney walked downstairs, she looked unhappy, moreso when she saw that he was alive.

"Where am I, what happened? Tierney!"

Tierney looked away and cried. AngryPidgeon was confused. Where was he? What was going on?

Within those moments of pondering, another girl walked downstairs. He gasped at what he saw. Josephine's right hand woman was looking at him. He should have felt honored, but instead, he was scared.

"Hello former captain AngryPidgeon"
"What do you mean 'Former Captain'?"
"Oh that's right, you just woke up from your coma, so let me fill you in on what you missed"

She filled him in with what was going on, AngryPidgeon looked shocked. This couldn't have been right.

"You used Time Magic, you couldn't handle it. You fell into a coma and now I am going to take it all away from you"
"What? Why? You can't-"

But his complaint was short-lived. AngryPidgeon stared in horror as the cell got darker, and darker, and darker....

"Darkaga"
"Ashley, no...."

AngryPidgeon was no more, he suffocated to the darkness surrounding him.

AngryPidgeon, Mod Plot Device, has died in the future.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Our time of celebrating was over, there were a few more members of this class that didn't belong to the light. Question was Who?

Slandaar looked suspious, probably because he was going through smoking withdrawls.
Bob was practicing his fighting moves with DarkLightA, who knows if that could come in handy soon.
Elyse wasn't doing much to talk about, just on her phone.

And that left RedCoyote.

For most of my time here, Red has been on his computer doing his homework. He left to use the restroom, so I decided to take this chance to sneak a look at that computer. And what I found was crazy. He wasn't doing homework, he was conspiring...

Videos, lots of videos of some kind of propaganda. I opened one.

"Hello" said a dark, intimating girl, beside her was another girl who looked like her foil.

"I'm Tiereny, Co-Leader of the Josephinic Army"
"And I'm Vironica, Leader of the Josephinic Army. We noticed your talents as a technical nerd, and we would like you to join us in our plan to bring back the true light that is darkness to the world. Everyday, while a majority of people bask in the light of the world, there are others who suffer. We know you are one of them. Join us, and one day, you will bask in the happiness you seek. Our purpose is-"

Something bumped my head. A gun.

"Red, why?"

Red was pointing a gun at me, I had no time to grab the magimence wand.

"Simple isn't it, Sala? I was bullied alot when I was younger. I became independent. When the light came, I expected to have friends. I didn't. So of course I would fight against this light. Its unfair that others are happy, and I'm not.

"You don't understand how this light works, Red."
"SHUT UP AND FUCK YOUR LIGHT"

*BANG* Red fell over. I looked over and saw the shooter. He was...

Elyse, Mafia Goon has completed her wincon, meaning she wins alongside RedCoyote and Hiplop

Her name was Benson. Her first name? Who gives a fuck? Or is it that she thinks no one gives a fuck? I don’t know. Just know her name is Benson. Benson was having a campfire deep in the heart of the foglands, the scariest place in the land due to the thick fog, unpredictable environment, and wild beasts. Many citizens from Appleby Heights and Kondi stay away from there. The only inhabitants of the foglands were a group of uncivilized people known as the Fogermen. The fogerman are said to be born with half a brain and would not survive in normal society such as Appleby Heights and Kondi. They live simple hunting and gathering lives.

Benson was not a fogerman. Benson was a citizen of Appleby Heights, and in fact, was a part of Alexandra’s team to defeat Josephine, so what was she doing here? She needed money by killing bounties.

All for her daughter…

The time in the foglands heightened her senses, she could hear and feel footsteps from a mile away. She heard unusual noises and decided to take a look.
A truck was running through. A semi? This isn’t good, Benson thought. She decided to follow the semi using the fog as a cover. A half mile later, the vehicle reached its destination. The driver and passenger exited the vehicle and unloaded the cargo: A man, tied up and knocked out. The driver then looked at a tree and said “The Darkness will rise again.” An elevator rose from inside the tree. In the three went.
Benson knew she needed to figure out whats up. Humans don’t go to the foglands.

She drew out her Benson Boosters and set off to work…
